column1: #text=I asked him if he was going to do anything special and he said no .
#text=I felt bad for him , so I said I would at least bake him a cake .
#text=Maybe this was a hasty decision since I have no experience baking cakes .
#text=So I looked online to see what I needed to do .
#text=I found a recipe that looked easy enough , so later that day I drove over to the grocery store to buy all the ingredients I would need to bake the cake .
#text=When I got to the store I started gathering up everything I needed .
#text=Once I almost had everything I turned down an aisle and noticed there were boxed of pre-made cake mix I could buy .
#text=This seemed like an easy option , so I put all the ingredients back and bought one of those mixes .
#text=All I needed to add to the mix was a couple eggs and some vegetable oil .
#text=After it was in the oven for an hour the cake was ready .
